name: .REPOBUNDLE File Extension
summary: Learn about .REPOBUNDLE files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open REPOBUNDLE files with Semiwork R.E.P.O. in Windows. Gamers often add content to R.E.P.O. with REPOLib, a widely used library. REPOLib loads REPOBUNDLE files stored in the BepInEx/â€‹plugins folder.
